oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Meet Lee Greenwood Christmas to Christmas Center Court (1312)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Holidays; Christmas; Greenwood, Lee; Color separation;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Two color half sheet (green and red on gray) announcing Lee Greenwood at the Center Court in the Rivergate Mall in celebration of his new Christmas album, Christmas to Christmas, on November 17. Poster is incomplete and probably would have included another application of color. To view the paperwork for this poster, see https://digi.countrymusichalloffame.org/digital/collection/hatch3/id/21154.
